item.title: OCIO - Python
item.description: I am writing a tool for Houdini that can create, save and apply color themes to color ramp parameters. In this project I needed to convert between color spaces. There are many ways to do this, but this led me to start exploring OCIO using Python. Below is a snippet that changes the color space of a list of rgb values from srgb to linear srgb. First I activate the venv into which I want to install OCIO Then I run pip install opencolorio With the package installed make sure that your IDE can access the package We also need to download a OCIO configuration file from here import os import PyOpenColorIO as OCIO def apply_rgb(rgb, src_space, dst_space): try: config = OCIO.
